translations.0: Fully active, able to carry on all pr: 0: Fully active, able to carry on all pre-disease performance without restriction
translations.1: Restricted in physically strenuous ac: 1: Restricted in physically strenuous activity but ambulatory and able to carry out work of a light or sedentary nature
translations.2: Ambulatory and capable of all self-ca: 2: Ambulatory and capable of all self-care but unable to carry out any work activities. Up and about more than 50% of waking hours
translations.3: Capable of only limited self-care, co: 3: Capable of only limited self-care, confined to bed or chair more than 50% of waking hours
translations.4: Completely disabled. Cannot carry out: 4: Completely disabled. Cannot carry out any selfcare; totally confined to bed or chair
translations.Advance decision to refuse treatment & r: Advance decision to refuse treatment & resuscitation status?
translations.Check also in 'Conditions' and update it: Check also in 'Conditions' and update it whenever necessary
translations.Check in 'Allergies' and update it if ne: Check in 'Allergies' and update it if necessary
translations.Check in 'Results' for relevant tests or: Check in 'Results' for relevant tests ordered
translations.Comments on lab tests and investigations: Comments on lab tests and investigations
translations.Describe findings from inspection, digit: Describe findings from inspection, digital and speculum examination of the vulva, vagina, cervix and rectum
translations.Describe outcomes and any complication f: Describe outcomes and any complication from treatments
translations.Description of aceto-white areas and oth: Description of aceto-white areas and other lesions (location, size)
translations.Details and additional relevant medical/: Details and additional relevant medical/surgical information
translations.Enter details and/or describe additional: Enter details and/or describe additional findings
translations.Feeling down, depressed, or hopeless ove: Feeling down, depressed, or hopeless over past two weeks
translations.Feeling nervous, anxious or on edge over: Feeling nervous, anxious or on edge over past two weeks
translations.Heart failure (NYHA I, II, III or IV): Heart failure (NYHA I, II, III or IV)
translations.IA - Invasive cancer identified only mi: IA -  Invasive cancer identified only microscopically. Invasion is limited to measured stromal invasion with a maximum depth of 5 mm and no wider than 7 mm
translations.IA1 - Measured invasion of the stroma <3: IA1 - Measured invasion of the stroma <3mm in depth and <7mm diameter width
translations.IA2 - Measured invasion of stroma <3mm b: IA2 - Measured invasion of stroma <3mm but <5mm in depth and <7mm diameter width
translations.IB - confined to the cervix or preclinic: IB - confined to the cervix or preclinical lesions greater than Stage IA
translations.II - Extension beyond the cervix but not: II - Extension beyond the cervix but not to the pelvic wall or to the lower third of the vagina
translations.III - Extension to the pelvic wall and/o: III - Extension to the pelvic wall and/or involves the lower third of the vagina and/or causes hydronephrosis or a nonfunctioning kidney
translations.IIIA - No extension into the pelvic side: IIIA - No extension into the pelvic sidewall but involvement of the lower third of the vagina
translations.IIIB - Extension into the pelvic sidewal: IIIB - Extension into the pelvic sidewall or hydronephrosis or non-functioning kidney
translations.IV - Extension beyond the true pelvis or: IV - Extension beyond the true pelvis or has clinically involved the mucosa of the bladder and/or rectum
translations.IVA - Spread of the tumour into adjacent: IVA - Spread of the tumour into adjacent pelvic organs
translations.If follow up consultation, changes in th: If follow up consultation, changes in the condition since last consultation
translations.If follow up consultation, select only n: If follow up consultation, select only new exams since last consultation
If follow up consultation, select only new treatment since last consultation
translations.In 'Appointments' set the next date for: In 'Appointments' set the next date for follow up whenever necessary
translations.Little interest or pleasure in doing thi: Little interest or pleasure in doing things over past two weeks
translations.Not being able to stop or control worryi: Not being able to stop or control worrying  over past two weeks
translations.Patient does not wish to get pregnant: Patient does not wish to get pregnant
translations.Please check in 'Medications' and add al: Please check in 'Medications' and add all active and relevant past medication used by the patient
translations.Please check in 'Vitals & Biometrics' fo: Please check in 'Vitals & Biometrics' for 'Temperature', 'Weight', 'BP', 'MUAC', 'Pulse', 'R.rate' and other parameters AND add current measurements whenever necessary
translations.Prescribe medication with the order bask: Prescribe medication with the order basket whenever necessary
translations.Weight loss / fatigue / loss of appetite: Weight loss / fatigue / loss of appetite
